thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
I've placed order( Ambre nuit ) three times and I received the confirmation emails but always after one day you sent me a cancellation email with no reason. I used different cards and emails but it didn't work and I sent an email to the costumer service asking them about the reason that's behind the cancellation but I didn't get reasonable answer. I'm frustrated because I can not buy my best perfume because we don't have stores in my city that sell La Collection Priv√©e - Ambre Nuit and I can't trust any online website except Dior website.
Best
